TopicTitle: How to disable? - Time warp to Manuever Node/AP/PE/

Articles.Content:
Hello Good morning, 

Is there a way to disable the new feature to warp? (small button on top of AP/PE and Nodes) ... im clicking there accidently sometimes and causing some pretty sad events in my game. Sorry if im the only one having this issue but hope someone can help me to improve my gameplay again cause im getting a bit frustrated with that ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Best regards, and may the liquid fuel be with you ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-31T20:26:41Z" title="05/31/2015 08:26  PM" data-short="9 yr">May 31, 2015</time> by Darkphas3**

I don't think you can disable this feature. Sorry.

Hopefully you'll get used to it. In the mean time, use plenty of Alt+F5. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

Cheers,

-Claw

Thanks Claw for the fast reply, i will wait a few more comments on this before changing this to "*answered*".. maybe theres some mod idk about that do exactly what im waiting for or some possible change in a stock file... BEst regards ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) and thanks again!

Is this seriously a thing in the stock game? This is the second thread about this and I saw nothing about it in the forum before 1.0 and I have yet to experience it in the game.

Is this \*not\* the KAC warp-to buttons? Or perhaps did KAC do something awesome and disable some stock feature that I didn't even know existed because it figured if I didn't want to see its buttons, I didn't want to see the stock ones as well?

I'm serious. I don't know what you're talking about because I've never seen stock buttons. I must be doing something right. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) Does someone have a picture of the buttons?

Ah, you know. I might have misread the question a bit.

There is a stock "warp to" feature, which pops up when you left click somewhere on the orbital lines. If there's a maneuver node, it'll also pop up the option to "warp to maneuver node."

I missed the part of the question about "warp to" buttons over AP/PE. That isn't a stock feature. Blame Trigger then... ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

Cheers,

~Claw

> Is this seriously a thing in the stock game? This is the second thread about this and I saw nothing about it in the forum before 1.0 and I have yet to experience it in the game.

Hi there, i just saw your post, im omw to take a screenshot of the buttons. BTW im using KAC mod, but i searched for an option to disable it in the mod (cause like you thought would be a feature from the mod) but couldnt find in the mod anything about it so i went ahead and google it... found this link to ksp forums about the changes on 1.0 concerning this buttons (line 12): [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/110482-KSP-1-0-General-Thread-All-the-new-features](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/110482-KSP-1-0-General-Thread-All-the-new-features)

 Still i will be super happy to find the source of this and if possible a solution, thank you for your time and hope you can help me out ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Best regards

WOW so its from KAC? its confirmed then? Awesome, thank you so much my fellow kerbonauts! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) hum... any way to disable that from KAC? or if i dont wanna get rid of KAC i just better get used to it?

THank you so much gentleman for your awesome help and time spent here ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) really apreciate it

Yeah I know about the "warp to" options in the stock game, but they are not easily oopsable. You have to click the thing, then select a "warp to" button. The KAC ones are almost infuriatingly easy to accidentally click on.

Assuming those are what you're talking about, you can disable them. I'm not running the game right now but according to a post on the KAC thread by TriggerAU, the option is in Settings->Specific Alarms->WarpTo Alarms

KAC also has an option to require a double-click to activate the 'warp to' markers. Designed specifically to prevent such accidents. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Have a poke around in the settings, you'll find it.

> 
> Yeah I know about the "warp to" options in the stock game, but they are not easily oopsable. You have to click the thing, then select a "warp to" button. The KAC ones are almost infuriatingly easy to accidentally click on.
> Assuming those are what you're talking about, you can disable them. I'm not running the game right now but according to a post on the KAC thread by TriggerAU, the option is in Settings->Specific Alarms->WarpTo Alarms

I feel like saying "I LOVE YOU.... THANK YOU SIR!"

damn... i looked for the option and was too stupid to find it, thank you again ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) you guys are all awesome ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) ..."running to my shuttle again if you dont mind...." ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
